discourse_list.title: Consol Freight update June 3rd 2022: ConsolFreight helps SME grow their business towards IPO

content.content: Dear Community, We are Ernesto Vila @EAV and Alejandro Gutierrez @AleG from ConsolFreight. This is the 2nd of what we hope to be a series of regular updates, the first one being our partnership with Mastercard and FreshSupplyCo. We are pleased to report that Bloomberg announced that Hanhwa Group, one of the SMEs ConsolFreight has worked with for the past year, has been able to secure a AUD140 MM capital commitment from Global Emerging Markets as they seek to go public. ConsolFreight continues to help them as they expand their operations into New Zealand commencing operations at the end of this month. Here is a quick overview Hanhwa Group is the Australian leader in manufacturing and distribution of GPS and navigation systems used by most major truck manufacturers. They were unable to secure purchase order (PO) financing from traditional lenders and found a viable alternative in DeFi through ConsolFreight’s logistics oriented protocol. ConsolFreight purchases the components from multiple suppliers in Asia, transports them to Australia where the components are assembled and ConsolFreight delivers the finished products to the final buyers. To date, ConsolFreight has funded over US$8MM for Hanhwa. We look forward to having similar success and impact on their expansion into the New Zealand and the European markets We would like to thank you all for the trust in us, and the RWF core team for their continuous support and guidance. Please do not hesitate to reach out to us with any questions. @EAV @AleG on behalf of all being involved!

EAV:  To date, ConsolFreight has funded over US$8MM for Hanhwa. We look forward to having similar success and impact on their expansion into the New Zealand and the European markets   Indeed. Good news for Gem, and Hanhwa Aus Pty Ltd—but how is this good news for MakerDAO? To date only 500k out of 2M DAI has been drawn out of the Console Freight Vault. And I gather the $8M USD in funding Console has provided to Hanhwa, has not included DAI.

Our pool has been steadily growing and I am sure this expansion of Hanhwa into other markets will require more liquidity where the Maker Vault will be instrumental to facilitate this growth. Independently of Hanhwa we are working with new clients where I am sure we will be making good use of the Maker Vault. Thanks for the continued support
This topic was automatically closed 90 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
